snippet.title: Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse - Official Gameplay Overview | The MIX Showcase March 2023
snippet.description:
Join the Viral Studios development team as they provide a look at their upcoming action-roguelike adventure game, Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse, including its comic book-style aesthetics, combat, utilizing ideal weapons in certain situations, and a peek at the story. Lethal Honor: Order of the Apocalypse will be available on Steam, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming
